extendedInfo.description: Have you had your Daily Break?Every day, Dailybreak launches new bite-sized Challenges about stuff you love. Challenges are brainteasers, quizzes, trivia, and games about pop culture, music, fashion, sports, and other topics. They help you have fun, learn new things, interact with friends, and unlock exclusive real prizes such as electronics, trips, gift cards, and more. Weâve given away over $300,000 worth of prizes, so what are you waiting for? Take your Daily Break and start winning today! Features: - New challenges & prizes launched daily - Exclusive mobile-only challenges - Complete challenges to win real prizes - Earn coins to enter prize raffles and bid in prize auctions- Daily break bonuses Notes: - No purchase necessary to enter challenges or claim a prize. - Must be US resident and at least 16 years old to be eligible to win - Each promotion is void where prohibited or restricted by law and is subject to applicable federal, state, and local laws, statues, ordinances, and regulations - Apple is not a sponsor of, nor involved in any way with, Dailybreak challenges, contests, sweepstakes or promotions. - Dailybreak challenges, contests, sweepstakes and promotions do not offer Apple products as prizes.]

reviews.title: Needs updated
reviews.comment: I love the app, but I haven\'t had a new challenge in a month. Your summary says new challenges everyday. :( I have some challenges in the incomplete folder that won\'t load. I will adjust the rating when the app is fixed.
reviews.author: Cassie Sirett

reviews.title: Good but no daily spin?
reviews.comment: I like this app but I think you forgot to include the daily spin in this program or am I not seeing it?
reviews.author: Brent Barnhill

reviews.title: Would not even install!
reviews.comment: I was really looking forward to playing on my phone versus online. So I was excited to install it on my Galaxy Note....a prompt came up and told me it was unable to install on my phone or my sd card. And after reading the reviews, I can say perhaps I will wait a bit longer, till the bugs are worked out.
reviews.author: Pattie Grimes

reviews.title: Issues
reviews.comment: At first I loved this app even with a few bugs involved, but now it\'s been over a month since I\'ve gotten a new challenge. So I literally don\'t have any reason to use the app anymore. If more challenges are put up then I\'d be happy to give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Rebecca Lloyd

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: I love this app..  But um,  I haven\'t had a new challenge in like 2 days.   Any reason for this? Revision  Been almost a week now and no updates... Update: am I missing something? Still no updates for new daily challenges.  It just tells me there are none available!  Can somebody please address my issue, I really.enjoy the trivia.  Is there a paid version I can get?  I don\'t mind paying, if that\'s what gets my issues addressed..
reviews.author: Jimmy Pearson

reviews.title: I like it.
reviews.comment: I find the trivia to be fun and educational. I\'m enjoying it.
reviews.author: Christina Tones

reviews.title: New version is awesome
reviews.comment: I love the slick interface and updated features. A+
reviews.author: Jared Stenquist

reviews.title: PLEASE FIX!!!
reviews.comment: It seems the mobile version of DailyBreak has been having issues lately awarding coins for completing challenges. I am not an exception. PLEASE FIX THIS SOON!!!
reviews.author: Matthew Alan Edwards

reviews.title: Coins
reviews.comment: Its says a get coins but I never receive them>=/ not cool. Fix fast or uninstalling!
reviews.author: Jazmin Padilla

reviews.title: Points
reviews.comment: Why am I not being credited points I earn?  Ridiculous! Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Kristin lea

reviews.title: WTF!
reviews.comment: THE APP WONT EVER LET ME LOG ON! IT LOGS WITH MY INTERNET & NETBOOK,BUT NOT THE APP!!!! FIX THIS & THEN WE CAN TALK!
reviews.author: Tiara Williams

reviews.title: My daily meditation!
reviews.comment: I have been playing for a long time now, and earning coins for prizes is so much fun with dailybreak. It doesn\'t feel like work, and you don\'t feel like you\'re not gaining anything while playing like other game and trivia websites! Now, they have it on mobile so I don\'t have to go to my internet on my phone to play. A simple app that\'s packed with fun and interesting facts! Keep up the good work, dailybreak!!  Thanks
reviews.author: Cynthia Brown

reviews.title: Dailybreak
reviews.comment: Love this game just wished they had more catergories that worked. The many catergories they have to offer say not available.
reviews.author: Jami Byrd

reviews.title: I have to redo challenges
reviews.comment: The challenges stay on until I beat them 2 times
reviews.author: Xavier Bond

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I use this app on my breaks and it\'s fun. Haven\'t won anything yet but I enjoy trying!
reviews.author: Geoff Daigle

reviews.title: Please fix bugs.
reviews.comment: It wont give me coins and it freezes sometimes.
reviews.author: Trinh Nguyen

reviews.title: Redemption
reviews.comment: Looks like DaybrEak tweeked the app to fix the crediting points problem and works really well now. I dig this app and site and won an awesome SPEAKER SYSTEM about a year ago. Thanks DaybrEak
reviews.author: Cameron Sulflow

reviews.title: Just a few more bugs to work out
reviews.comment: I love Dailybreak. This app is great and it was working great after the last update, but only for a few days and it was back to not registering that challenges were completed. Also it would be nice to see the time left on raffles and auctions.
reviews.author: Brandi Snider

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I hope you can fix it soon.  Won\'t delete because I see potential in this app.
reviews.author: Bryan Trabing
